plot: Civil servant finds about a group of mill owners who are defrauding some Government taxes. They try to buy him offering a considerable sum, hoping he would lay off the investigation, but he resists.
title: Sonhando com Milhões
plot_es: Civil servant finds about a group of mill owners who are defrauding some Government taxes. They try to buy him offering a considerable sum, hoping he would lay off the investigation, but he resists.
plot_en: Civil servant finds about a group of mill owners who are defrauding some Government taxes. They try to buy him offering a considerable sum, hoping he would lay off the investigation, but he resists.
